title: I have a code for a free ''Dreadknight Garen'' Skin
body: And I am unable to redeem it, everytime I try I get the same error message. ''There was a problem fulfilling your store items, please try again'' is it just not available right now or is the even over? it says the code expires in august of 2018. Please help, Ive been playing garen for my first few matches and I would like to equip a skin for him! :)

replies.body: Sorry you had trouble redeeming that code.  I've added the skin for you manually!
